tasting_notes.appearance: Deep ruby red with a hint of purple.
tasting_notes.nose: Dark fruits (blackcurrant, blackberry), hints of vanilla and tobacco, light pepper spice.
tasting_notes.taste: Full-bodied, with bold tannins and a rich fruit profile, integrated oak influence, velvety mouthfeel.
tasting_notes.finish: Long, with dark chocolate and a touch of earthy minerality.

tasting_notes.appearance: Light ruby, translucent, almost ethereal in color.
tasting_notes.nose: Bright red fruit (strawberry, raspberry), earthy notes of forest floor and a touch of floral violet.
tasting_notes.taste: Lighter-bodied, with smooth tannins and crisp acidity. Red fruit flavors dominate, with a subtle earthy undertone.
tasting_notes.finish: Soft, with lingering red berry flavors and an elegant, clean finish.

tasting_notes.nose: Blackberry, plum, tobacco, and hints of earthy oak.
tasting_notes.taste: Medium to full-bodied, with smooth tannins and a rich profile of dark fruits and subtle spices.
tasting_notes.finish: A long, smooth finish with earthy nuances and a touch of spice.

tasting_notes.nose: Citrus (lemon, lime), passion fruit, and a hint of freshly cut grass.
tasting_notes.taste: Crisp, zesty, with a burst of citrus and tropical fruit flavors, balanced by lively acidity.
